title: 原版物品无法交互
author: 六柒叁
txt_content:
例如什么熔炉潜影盒工作台等等都打不开我觉得是插件BUG
有人帮忙看看吗





S9IC7K@HMX9P)C]V~}~HA2J.jpg (315.49 KB, 下载次数: 0)

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
plugins/residence/flags.yml
拉到最下面这段
ItemList:
  # list name is not important, as long as it is unique. Its good to use a descripive name.
  DefaultList:
    # type of the list, can be blacklist, whitelist, or ignorelist
    Type: blacklist
    # If you want, you can have this list only apply to one world, otherwise it applies to all worlds
    # World: world
    # You can also have the list apply only to one group, otherwise it applies for all groups
    # Group: default
    # this is the actual list of material names that this list allows or disallows
    # You can look up the material name by item ID in game by typing /res material <id>
    # Alternativly, you can simply use the item ID in the list, but its less descriptive and harder to see what the list allows or dissallows at a glance
    Items:
    - BEDROCK
    - xxxx
复制代码

改成这样
ItemList:
  # list name is not important, as long as it is unique. Its good to use a descripive name.
  DefaultList:
    # type of the list, can be blacklist, whitelist, or ignorelist
    Type: blacklist
    # If you want, you can have this list only apply to one world, otherwise it applies to all worlds
    # World: world
    # You can also have the list apply only to one group, otherwise it applies for all groups
    # Group: default
    # this is the actual list of material names that this list allows or disallows
    # You can look up the material name by item ID in game by typing /res material <id>
    # Alternativly, you can simply use the item ID in the list, but its less descriptive and harder to see what the list allows or dissallows at a glance
    Items: []
复制代码

用的
是ess吗？将权限组builder设置为true

replies.author: maomao2015
replies.txt_content: 可能潜影盒被写入了最下面blacklist里面

replies.author: 李舜死
replies.txt_content: ess配置文件，有个blacklist什么的，你看看  是不是你交互的东西在这个列表里面。然后就是你是不是打开了白名单。
